projects.name: stock prediction with deep learning
bullets: For the 2019 Rice Datathon, I designed and implemented a back propagation neural network, receiving Best Underclassmen Project.
I did this implementation from scratch and used an API only to pull live updating market data to use to train and test the model.
I applied this deep learning algorithm to real world stock data to create model used to generate predictions for future trends and stock changes.

projects.name: mcmurtry college website
bullets: As part of my position as head of the website committee for my residential college, McMurtry, I designed and coded a new website fully from scratch for the college.
The final website is deployed, and can be viewed at mcmurtry.rice.edu.
The website is created using JavaScript and React, and the code can be found at https://github.com/mcmurtrycollege/McMurtry-Website-Active.

projects.name: rice datathon website
bullets: I have also designed and coded the website for the Rice Datathon, which is used to manage logistical elements and coordinate/spread information about the event
The final website can be viewed at datathon.rice.edu.
This website is also created using JavaScript and React, and the source code is located at https://github.com/RiceDatathon/Rice-Datathon-Website.
